text: B. Griffith was an American football coach. He served as the head football coach at Franklin & Marshall College in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. He held that position for the 1891 and 1892 seasons. His coaching record at Franklin & Marshall was 6–7. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Franklin & Marshall Diplomats football coaches
title: B. Griffith
